mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.nyear AS "nyear", a.enterprise_type AS "enterpriseType", a.enterprise_count AS "enterpriseCount", a.enterprise_money AS "enterpriseMoney", a.person_count AS "personCount"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cache_enterprise_basic_data( id, nyear, enterprise_type, enterprise_count, enterprise_money, person_count ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{nyear}, #{enterpriseType}, #{enterpriseCount}, #{enterpriseMoney}, #{personCount} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cache_enterprise_basic_data SET nyear = #{nyear}, enterprise_type = #{enterpriseType}, enterprise_count = #{enterpriseCount}, enterprise_money = #{enterpriseMoney}, person_count = #{personCount} WHERE id = #{id}
